short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that downloads (csv or xlsx) a single page from an active Google Sheets tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that downloads a single page from an active Google Sheets tab (csv or xlsx), that way you don't have to download the entire spreadsheet for one page
